text: Muziririjwe (kurongora) ba nyoko, abakobwa banyu, bashiki banyu, ba nyogosenge, ba nyoko wanyu, abakobwa b’ababavandimwe banyu, abishywa banyu, ba nyoko babonkeje, bashiki banyu mwasangiye ibere, ba nyokobukwe, abakobwa mwareze b’abagore banyu mwarwamanye; ariko iyo mutaryamanye nta cyaha kuri mwe (kurongora abakobwa babo), n’abakazana banyu ku bana babakomokaho, munazirirjwe gushaka abavandimwe babiri mu gihe kimwe, uretse ibyahise (mbere ya Isilamu). Mu by’ukuri, Allah ni Ubabarira ibyaha, Nyirimbabazi
